Name: NOTED
Author: Tischel
Description:
Lets you create notes that are linked to specific duties (they will only show during those duties).
You can also tie notes to certain jobs so they only appear when on the right job.
Changelog:
1.1.1.0
- Combined all duties from The Masked Carnivale into a single entry.
	+ Each challenge was treated as a different duty before, but since the internal ID is the same it was creating issues.
